text: If the fish were men, they would have their art. There would be beautiful pictures of the teeth of the sharks in wonderful colors, and their mouths as pure gardens of recreation in which it would be a pleasure to eat. The theatres of the sea bottom would show heroic pelicans entering excitedly into the tidal pools, and the music would be so beautiful that, to its hushed tones preceded by the orchestra, the pelicans would plunge into the tidal pools, roused by the most delicious thoughts, as in a dream. FIN
title: Si los tiburones fueran hombres IV
author: Bertolt Brecht
